mapper.select: select q.qc_num, p.wo_num, p.manu_name, p.manu_code, p.item_name, p.item_num, CONCAT('QC',lpad(q.qc_num,6,0)) qc_code, q.qc_status, q.emp_Kname, q.qc_qty, q.manu_fail, sum(p.manu_tocount) manu_tocount, w.wo_qty, date_format(q.qc_date, '%Y-%m-%d') qc_date from productstatus p right join workorder w on p.wo_num = w.wo_num left join qc_status q on q.wo_num = p.wo_num group by p.wo_num having manu_tocount = wo_qty

select q.qc_num, p.wo_num, p.manu_name, p.manu_code, p.item_name, p.item_num, q.qc_code, w.wo_qty, q.qc_status, q.qc_qty, q.manu_fail, sum(p.manu_tocount) manu_tocount, w.wo_qty, q.qc_date from productstatus p right join workorder w on p.wo_num = w.wo_num left join qc_status q on q.wo_num = p.wo_num where p.wo_num = #{wo_num} group by p.wo_num having manu_tocount = wo_qty
select emp_num, emp_Kname from employee where emp_num = #{emp_num}
select wo_num, lpad(qc_num+1,6,0) qc_code from qc_status where wo_num = #{wo_num}
mapper.insert: insert into qc_status (wo_num, manu_name, manu_code, item_name, item_num, qc_code, emp_Kname, qc_status, manu_tocount, qc_qty, manu_fail, qc_date) values (#{wo_num}, #{manu_name}, #{manu_code}, #{item_name}, #{item_num}, #{qc_num}+1, #{emp_Kname}, #{qc_status}, #{manu_tocount}, #{qc_qty}, #{manu_fail}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'));
mapper.update: update qc_status set qc_qty = #{qc_qty}, qc_status = #{qc_status}, qc_date = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), manu_fail = #{manu_fail} where qc_num = #{qc_num}
mapper.select: select CONCAT('F',lpad(d.fail_num,6,0)) fail_num, q.wo_num, q.manu_name, q.manu_code, q.item_name, q.item_num, d.emp_Kname, (q.manu_fail+p.manu_fail) fail_qty, date_format(d.fail_date, '%Y-%m-%d') fail_date from productstatus p join qc_status q on p.wo_num = q.wo_num left join defective d on q.wo_num = d.wo_num group by q.emp_Kname, q.manu_fail, q.wo_num;
mapper.update: update defective set fail_reson = #{fail_reson}, fail_date = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') where fail_num = #{fail_num}
